titles.title: Providing for an organizational caucus or conference in the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Sixth Congress.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 594, H. Res. 606 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: 10/20/1998--Introduced. Authorizes any organizational caucus or conference in the House of Representatives for the 106th Congress to begin on or after November 13, 1998.
